description.narrative: IR 3: Disaster Risk Reduction in education sector is mainstreamed and the education emergency cluster responds to human and natural disasters, which contributes to Education In Emergencies, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: National and sub-national, systems and policy frameworks and implementation capacity strengthened to improve access to quality basic education and skills development for marginalised children and youth, including in emergencies

participating-org.narrative: DEPARTMENT OF GENDER AND SOCIAL SER GARISSA

System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
System strengthening - risk informed programming, including climate, resilience, disaster, conflict, and emergency preparedness
